price: (Musa) akasema: Nilitenda hayo hapo nilipo kuwa miongoni mwa wale walio potea.
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
footnotes: Musa akasema: Niliyafanya uliyo yataja kwa kutojua yanayo faa kutambulikana kwa akili nayo ni jambo la kuuwa. Basi hapana masimbulizi juu yangu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
